item.title: "kill" command [317]
item.dc:creator: @ruupe ruupe
item.description:
@ruupe wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]}
Not sure of the base, or your methods, but this should fix some errors:

if(command.equals("kill") && p.username.equals("Owner")) { sM("You have just struck down" + p.username + "."); sM("You have just been struck down by " + p.player + "."); c.requestGFX(1555, 0); c.appendHit(255, 0); } [/quote]

When i did that it only gaves 5 errors

sM(You have just Striked Down " + p.username);
sM("You have just been striked down by " + p.player + ");
c.requestGFX(1555, 0);
